name: retrospective-ai-plugin
description: AI-powered note analysis and reflection tool for Obsidian. Analyze your notes, generate insights, and create summaries with privacy protection.

scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && cp main.js manifest.json .obsidian-test/.obsidian/plugins/retrospectai/
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Ernie Hsiung
